attributes.additional_details:
We the undersigned want to ensure that Heart Park & Beach continues to allow people to visit from the surrounding areas to enjoy this local amenity.

Hard up families do NOT want to travel 120 miles to visit a beach & park when there is a fully operational and excellently staffed facility on their doorstep.

Stop taking away our facilities and save jobs in the local community.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the local authority.
